channel.title: General Google Gmail Email on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Google Gmail Email on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: got gmail back. weird...
item.description: So i got gmail back this morning. had a bundle of mail that i didn’t get to see yesterday. weird. What was really annoying was that google didn’t respond and that there hasn’t been a response before. It just seems that they are ignoring a problem. Even if they were like “oh your email is broken until tomorrow” that would be better. it was rather frustrating.. maybe it is time to move to yahoo.
